劖字的基本解释

劖
chán
用锐利的器具凿或铲：劖石得泉。
古代一种铲、斫工具。
砭刺；刺：以劖刺之。
讽刺：劖言讪语。
剜；割：碎劖碎剁。
铲除。
姓。

劖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chán］
［《廣韻》鋤銜切，平銜，崇。］
(1)刺；砭刺。
(2)断；凿。
(3)削。
(4)讽刺。
(5)铲具名。
(6)砍杀；杀死。
(7)折磨。
(8)犹破除。消除。
(9)同“劖”。

劖字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　劖； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页145第38
【唐韻】鋤銜切【集韻】【韻會】鋤咸切，?音巉。【說文】斷也。从刀，毚聲。一曰剽釗也。【徐曰】劖，鑿也。【韓愈·酬司門盧汀詩】若使乘酣馳雄怪，造化何以當鐫劖。又【集韻】士減切。音巉。義同。

劖字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
劖字的起名意思

暂无。

bore
Basic explanation of words
bore
chán
Chisel or shovel with a sharp tool: Shi Dequan.
A kind of shovel and shovel tool in ancient times.
Bianstone; thorn: to thorn it.
Irony: Shameless.
Cut; cut: chopped chopped chopped chopped.
eradicate.
name.
bore
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chán］
["Guangyun" hoe title cut, flat title, Chong. ]
(1) Thorn; Bianstone.
(2) Broken; chisel.
(3) Cut.
(4) Satire.
(5) The name of the shovel.
(6) Hack and kill; kill.
(7) Torture.
(8) Still broken. eliminate.
(9) Same as "劖".
bore
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Sword Department] 　劖; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 145-38
[Tang Yun] Hoe and cut [Jiyun] [Rhyme] Hoe salty and cut,? Sound. [Said the text] Shut also. From the knife, the sound. One said, Pizhao also. [Xu Yue] Hey, chisel it. 【Han Yu·Chou Simen Lu Ting Poetry】If you make a ride and ride a hero, why should good luck be swaying? Also 【Jiyun】Science reduction. Sound 巉. The same meaning.
